ygData.subject: RE: Woohoo!  New effects for Singing Steel!
ygData.msgSnippet: ... I know it sounds stupid, but I supply water for a good wizard friend.  What I had found useful about the Singing Steel boots is that I can summon maybe 3
ygData.messageBody:
> Date: Tue, 27 Mar 2001 15:59:50 -0700
> From: "Kimes, Dean W." <dean_kimes@...>
>Subject: RE: Woohoo! New effects for Singing Steel!
>
> >SADDERZ for me, i'm gonna have to drag my sorry butt out of sebilis to
>run
>to
> >town to buy food and water now. (well mostly water)
>
>Don't yaz know any helpful clerics/magicians?
>Summoning Food and Water 1 at a time was so painful, especially since it
>takes away from /gems time. ;-p
>
> Kit


I know it sounds stupid, but I supply water for a good wizard friend. What
I had found useful about the Singing Steel boots is that I can summon maybe
3 pods of water from them, and then drink that while I build up my stock of
foraged water. Now, I was only on for a few minutes last night, so I wasn't
in a group, but so far the boots effect seems to be self-only (unless it's
the whole group). I tried targetting someone and clicking my heels together
(hehe) and it lev'd myself only.

Now the greaves having screech as a right-click effect is awesome. Very
handy. I just wish they'd stop putting humerous effects on the pants...
(ahh, you're hungry? Let's see if I can dig up some food out of my pants...
has now been replaced by: <group> EVAC EVAC!!! <me> Don't worry, I'll
wiggle my butt at them and we can get away! <mobs> Ewww, stinky, let's get
out of here!

Olgwinn Pendragun
Bard of 52 Songs
Crimson Legacy
E'ci
